Hearthstone Tournaments via Battlefy

20 Jun 2016
Battlefy Shoutout

I discovered this great web app called Battlefy while watching a Hearthstone podcast called "The Angry Chicken". It makes tournament set up and organization a breeze. This will allow me to run tournaments more frequently. As such...

June Tournament Status

This tournament is almost done. We are now down to the Loser Bracket Finals feature Alkrym vs Jonstrange. The winner will go on to the grand finals to play our defending champion Dragonheart. CLICK HERE for the tournament bracket.

July Tournament Status

I've gone ahead and opened up July's registration. The rules for this tournament are slightly different so please be sure to read the rules. You'll find a contact e-mail on the battlefy page if you have any questions. CLICK HERE to join.

Get Some Sleep Flarez (and Mythic Updates)

08 Feb 2016
Honorable Kill Event

Flarez has come out on top after a long weekend of killing Horde. He proved that with hardwork and dedication, your dreams of winning a Dragon Knight guild event can come true. Overall the event was a huge successm, but the format could probably use a little work. Feel free to contact me if you have any suggestions.

Top 3
1Flarez5713
2Skifree3840
3Evgenimalkin3380
Mythic Progression

Last week we had great success in Mythic HFC and were able to kill Gorefiend and Iskar in a single night. I have uploaded tank perspective video for each kill. Check them out below.

New Event! New Site!

02 Feb 2016
Honorable Kill Event This Weekend

The Honorable Kill guild event is this weekend from 7PM Friday to 7PM Sunday (all times are server time). These times may not be perfect for everybody but the weekend is normally the best time for things like this.

I'll need all of your character names if you want to compete but plan on gearing multiple characters. For a refresher, link to rules and format are below
